newsitem.title: USA: Md. panel approves $1.5 mln for local companies.
newsitem.headline: Md. panel approves $1.5 mln for local companies.

text.p: A committee of Maryland lawmakers has approved $1.5 million in aid to two Maryland businesses that is expected to create new 125 jobs.
The legislators agreed to a $1 million loan to the Bata Shoe Company in Belcamp. The loan will finance an expansion that will create more than 100 new jobs.
The committee also approved a half-million dollar loan to the Solo Cup Company in Havre De Grace. Solo plans to add another 25 jobs to the 500 existing positions in Harford County.
